fulltext:
CANDIDATE’S PROFILE 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
Full name 
 : LE THUY TRUC (Annie Le)  
Date of Birth  
: 1991  
Gender  
   : Female 
Preferred working location 
: HCMC 
Position applied  
            : Recruitment Executive  
SUMMARY 
Accomplished Senior HR or Senior Recruitment Specialist over 5 years of experience reaching out the 
recruitment target with talented and "right" person as well as improving the retention rate of the labor force in 
company. Meticulous, enthusiasm and empathy driven me easily understand the insight feeling as well as being 
active and proactive to solve any issues raising among the employee are what I am good at doing. Leverages 
exemplary communication and in-person meetings to establish company culture and build a positive image while 
motivating continuous employee engagement. Adept at working effectively to achieve goals both as a cross-
functional team member and individual contributor. 
ACADEMIC AND ACHIEVEMENTS 
Academic 
Ton Duc Thang University | 2009 - 2013 
Major: Bachelor of International Business 
Certificate  
CED INSTITUTE | 2014 
Major: Certificate of Human Resource Management  
Achievements 
Leading a team of 30 members of International Volunteer Group at Ton Duc Thang University. This 
group is in charge of supporting on organization for international seminars and conferences taking place 
in university campus. 
Skills  
✓ Communication, 
✓ Presentation, 
✓ Negotiation,  
✓ Time-management, 
✓ Leadership; 
✓ Proficient at MS Office, Internet, in particular, Salesforce System, HR Orange system; 
✓ Fluent English 
• 
• 
• 
• 
CV Annie Le – Recruitment Executive 
Prepared by Viet688 
PROFESSIONAL WORKING EXPERIENCE  
GO GAME VIETNAM | SENIOR RECRUITMENT SPECIALIST | Nov-2017 – Mar 2019 
GoGame is a mobile game publisher and tech company here to make good games great. 
1.     Recruitment  
• 
Work closely with HR team and hiring managers to ensure recruitment need and update hiring 
manager about hiring status;  
• 
Responsible for the whole recruitment activities and deliver recruitment services;  
• 
Coordinate or join in indoors or outdoors recruitment events;  
• 
Enrich networking, sources and build relationships with passive candidates;  
• 
Develop talent pool for various key positions for the identified plan;  
• 
Manage, update and enlarge Candidate Master List;  
• 
Develop recruitment strategies and perform full cycle recruiting for the company’s needs;  
• 
Develop an understanding of business requirements, organization plans and candidate qualifications 
by establishing partnerships interviewing leads;  
• 
Present employment offers by selling organization values, strengths and opportunities;  
• 
Maintain relationships with business networks and professional organizations in order to gain 
knowledge and obtain referrals;  
• 
Work with Recruitment Service Company to manage job posting and evaluate its effectiveness;  
• 
Develop strong relationships with individuals at all levels of the organization;  
• 
Prepare different reports to meet the status update need; and year-end party to strengthen teamwork. 
2.     Staff Engagement & Company Culture Development  
• 
Build up strong company culture: young, dynamic, ethical, confident individuals;  
• 
Set up, purchase, dealing with suppliers and manage logistics;   
• 
Engage and allocate staff in organizing for different company culture activities and events: 
teambuilding, company trip, gala dinner. 
3.     HR operation  
• 
Drafting, finalizing and recording contracts, decisions and other official documents needed for HR 
Operations;  
• 
Conducting and analyzing exit procedures and exit interviews (if needed);  
• 
Maintains historical human resource records by designing a filing and retrieval system; keeping past 
and current records;  
• 
In charge of attendance record, direct disciplinary procedures;  
• 
Manage staff procedure, welcome new joiners and monitor all required documents;  
• 
Issue and archive contracts, decision on salary, position;  
• 
Support the resignation procedures, exit checklist, probation & contract renewal;  
• 
Update changes monthly to Accounting to finalize salary payment, insurance and income tax 
according to company policy;  
• 
Update other benefits of staff: uniform allowance, health care etc.  
4.     Administration  
• 
Stationery management  
• 
Time tracking report  
• 
Transportation and accommodation booking  
5.     Employee relation and Benefits 
•  
Support required paperwork for compensation and benefit. 
6.     Employer branding:  
CV Annie Le – Recruitment Executive 
Prepared by Viet688 
• 
Support Marketing team to create Social media marketing, helping with creation of video based;  
• 
Internal marketing of initiatives to help mobilize volunteers for various initiatives.  
Act as HRM responsibilities in case of her absenteeism to handle whole office’s issues if any.  
Achievement:   
- 
Meet recruitment target in 2018 (new hires – 40 vacancies) at all levels mostly focused on Senior. 
IMM GROUP | SENIOR HR EXECUTIVE | Jun 2017 – Oct 2017 
MM Group is one of the leading groups in immigration with variety services and project plans for business-class 
customers to USA, Australia, Portugal, Canada, Ireland and Cyprus. Being a professional provider in proving 
abroad real estate in Australia, USA and Cyprus.  
1.     Recruitment  
• 
Get request from Line Manager about recruitment demand, discuss and create job description as 
requirement with variety field as tourism and hospitality, marketing, IT, real estate, consultant service and 
sales;  
• 
Establishing a recruiting, testing, and interviewing program; coordinate and counseling managers 
on candidate selection to meet business objectives;  
• 
Set up, develop and improve a variety of tools and strategies to widen talent pool and network 
through different channels;  
• 
Managing budget, contact and negotiate with different suppliers to optimize recruitment procedures;  
• 
Set up and maintain recruitment framework for IMM Group to find the “right person” that will be 
the representative of the company to deliver excellence internally and externally;  
• 
Negotiate contract details such as benefit package, joining date with candidates to finalize offer 
letters.  
2.     Staff Engagement & Company Culture Development  
• 
Build up strong company culture: young, dynamic, ethical, confident individuals;  
• 
Set up, purchase, dealing with suppliers and manage logistics; engage and allocate staff in 
organizing for different company culture activities and events: teambuilding, charity, company trip, gala 
dinner to strengthen teamwork.  
3.     Training  
• 
Understand individual’s values and career orientation to optimize personnel resource;  
• 
Conduct orientation training for newcomers: company policy, CRM, email system, company 
culture;  
• 
Identify, analyze, counsel and review training needs for different departments to meet objectives. 
Ensure that staff have competency and knowledge to deliver exquisite standards of services internally and 
externally.   
4.     HR operation  
• 
Drafting, finalizing and recording contracts, decisions and other official documents needed for HR 
Operations;  
• 
Conducting and analyzing exit procedures and exit interviews (if needed);  
• 
Maintains historical human resource records by designing a filing and retrieval system; keeping past 
and current records;  
• 
In charge of attendance record, direct disciplinary procedures.  
• 
Manage staff procedure, welcome new joiners and monitor all required documents;  
• 
Issue and archive contracts, decision on salary, position;  
CV Annie Le – Recruitment Executive 
Prepared by Viet688 
• 
Support the resignation procedures, exit checklist, probation & contract renewal;  
• 
Update changes monthly to Accounting to finalize salary payment, insurance and income tax 
according to company policy;  
• 
Update other benefits of staff: uniform allowance, health care etc.  
5.     Employee relation and Benefits  
•  
Support required paperwork for compensation and benefit. 
TQS GROUP | HR EXECUTIVE | Oct 2014 – Mar 2017 
TQS Group is an IT outsourcing for USA project specializing in international telecom - Lunex Telecom  
1. Administration  
• 
Monitor stationery, official facility and make order as needed;  
• 
In charge of collecting and paying utility bills;  
 2. Recruitment  
• 
Posting job ads and organizing resumes and job applications (such as: QC/QA, Back-end/front-end 
Developer, Mobile Apps Developer...at different levels);  
• 
Scheduling job interviews, conducting interview face to face from A-Z;  
• 
Ensuring background and reference checks are completed;  
• 
Preparing new employee files;  
• 
In charge of attendance record, direct disciplinary procedures;  
• 
Manage staff procedure, welcome new joiners and monitor all required documents;  
• 
Issue and archive contracts, decision on salary, position;  
• 
Orienting new employees to the organization (setting up a designated log-in, workstation…) 
• 
Overseeing the completion of compensation and benefit documentation;  
• 
Serving as a point person for all new employee questions.  
3. HR Operation  
• 
Maintaining current HR files and databases;  
• 
Updating and maintaining employee benefits, employment status, and similar records;  
• 
Maintaining records related to grievances, performance reviews, and disciplinary actions;  
• 
Performing file audits to ensure that all required employee documentation is collected and 
maintained;  
• 
Completing termination paperwork and assisting with exist interviews;  
• 
Support to prepare and submit report to labor Department;  
• 
Collect and notarize/ legalize paperwork from expats for work permit/residence card submission;  
4. Organize internal events for company:   
Vietnamese/ International Women Day, Halloween, Christmas, Teambuilding, company trips, year-
end party… 
TQS GROUP | ASSISTANT TO SHIFT MANAGER | May 2014 – Oct 2014 
TQS Group is an IT outsourcing for USA project specializing in international telecom - Lunex Telecom  
• 
Support team members achieve requirements; 
• 
Do daily/ weekly/ monthly sale report; 
• 
Support training new staff; 
• 
Support customer’s needs or solve problem on the line if any; 
• 
Monitor online sale. 
CV Annie Le – Recruitment Executive 
Prepared by Viet688
